page.title: 11ATHERSLEY AREA OCCUPATIONS.
page.content: We have surveyed 370 adults in Athersley South.We have sent letters to the main {employers }in the area. We found that 64% of women are { {housewives.}25% of men are {miners. 13% of men are {unemployed.}4% of women are {shop assistants. }3% of women are {cleaners.}There were 89 different jobs altogether. Most people who live in our survey area do not work in it. The largest employer in the area is {North Gawber {Colliery}which is soon to close and merge with {Woolley Colliery. } 14 schools provde {employment}for about 200{teachers}and 100{caretakers} {cleaners}and{kitchen staff.}Smithies Lane Council Depot employs 123 people of whom only 12 people live locally. One of the most successful firms in the area is the Paul Sykes Organisation.
